feels.name: Trust
feels.quote: Mrs. Wilkins asserted that it would be quite true.

feels.name: Joy
feels.quote: They did, both of them, for a whole day feel that the only thing to be done was to renounce the mediaeval castle; and it was in arriving at this bitter decision that they really realised how acute had been their longing for it.
feels.exactPlace: In arriving at this bitter decision

feels.name: Fear
feels.quote: She felt happy, and she felt guilty, and she felt afraid.
feels.exactPlace: At the end of the meeting

feels.name: Guilty
feels.quote: She felt happy, and she felt guilty, and she felt afraid.
feels.exactPlace: At the end of the meeting

feels.name: Happiness
feels.quote: She felt happy, and she felt guilty, and she felt afraid.
feels.exactPlace: At the end of the meeting
